description: A moving letter has arrived from a small boy about to undergo surgery. Tachibana thinks that it is a great opportunity to develop Mami`s image, but instead they discover that the patient is actually Zenigame Gotaro, a local mafia boss. Ken, Gotaro`s grandson, had lied in the letter so that he could get to see Mami. Tachibana is afraid that the situation is going to end in scandal for Mami, but she hatches a better plan...
